name: CYNOROID -GENTAGELSE
description:
The Old Style 2d-action-shooting-platformer.

Slash the Enemy!

Using 4weapons.

You Can Use "shot","cutter","burner","cannon".

Melancholy Monsters Death Moments,
Bloody Battle Fields.

This Is the Old Style Platformer.

WEAPONS

ARM GUN

This is the basic weapon.
Ammo is unlimit.

CUTTER

This is the offensive weapon.
You can erase a enemys bullet.
And throgh the wall.

BURNER

This is the defensive weapon.
You can erase a enemys bullet.

CANONN

KABOOM!
